1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Baala global data.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Global
6  ( baalaGlobal,
7    baalaRops,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base      as B
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data      as D
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core      as C
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Flat  as Rop
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Nest  as Rop
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox   as Rop
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop       as Cop
17
18-- | Global with operators.
19baalaGlobal :: (D.CContent c) => C.Global c
20baalaGlobal = global where
21    global    = C.global { C.globalOpset     = C.opsetFill opset }
22    opset     = B.def    { C.opsetRopList    = baalaRops
23                         , C.opsetCop        = copset }
24    copset    = B.def    { D.copsetCopList   = Cop.baalaCops
25                         , D.copsetInfixList = Cop.baalaInfix }
26
27-- | Relmap operators
28baalaRops :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
29baalaRops = Rop.ropsCox
30         ++ Rop.ropsFlat
31         ++ Rop.ropsNest
32
